Lunarpine falls back in an immense amount of pain, he'd stopped Ares 
from doing more harm, unfortunately the cost was 92% of his optical 
scanners. he no longer could see any details around him. just shapes 
and blurs of movement.his olfactory sensors were still functioning 
though after that last shot he yook he didn't know for how long, 
Lunarpine transformed to wolf mode and used his sense of smell to 
head toward the ark. he was prepared to attack anything that got 
between him and the ark. he just hoped that it wasn't Maximal.

"Lunarpine to maximals I've taken heavy damage and need some cover 
fire. if you're close identify yourself, I don't want to avoid any 
friendly fire situations if I can." Lunarpines warning could be heard 
from both sides. he just hoped the enemy was to bust with the other 
Maximals to bother him. Ares scent didn't seem to be following him. 
This wolf hoped that the ram was as damagedas he was if not more.

It was a good thing he'd stayed here for a short time, he could smell 
his way around to make do.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Inferno731@a... wrote:
> Sixshot was so surprised that Prowl missed him that he lost 
consentration and 
> his wing were shot off by ramulus. He proceed to crash right at the 
ram.
> 
> Hades gets continually slashed by striker and tries to ignore the 
pain that 
> he is in and tries to keep attacking Striker but is almost to week 
to move.
> 
> Shuko catches the charge right when it blows up and flys back 
hitting a tree.
> 
> Ares gets slashed so much that he can barely move, so he activates 
to 
> shoulder cannons and shoots Lunarpine the face.
> Ares: I do not think you like the taste of this ram's ammo though!
